p: The empirical data did not provide individual vaccine efficacy estimates for each influenza A subtype and influenza B lineage (Table A in S1 Text). We therefore used a set of simplifying assumptions to produce the strain-specific, vaccine efficacy point estimates used within our study ( Table 1). The time-varying vaccine uptake data, together with the season-specific information on vaccine efficacy, act as forcing for the within-season epidemiological model (details are described in Sections 1.4-1.5 of the S1 Text).
